website_summaries.verdict: Especially simple to install, vividly colored, and affordable enough to easily outfit every commode in your home, the Vintar toilet light is a great deal.
pros: Features a wide 170 degree motion and light sensor
Easily wraps around all toilet bowls
cons: This toilet light requires 3 AAA batteries, and you will need to buy them separately

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Light! A Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, I was very exhausted and wedding stressed when I purchased this lightning deal off of amazon. I forgot about it and my fiancée just gave me that WTF look. Anyways, we both LOOOOOVE it! You can set it on one color or do multiple where it continues to change. It has a sensor and turns on when it's dark. It lights up the toilet bowl but also the whole bathroom & really is the perfect nightlight. If it broke, I would seriously buy another one that day. Plus, my fiancée enjoys peeing on the ever-changing colors because he is a man-child.
customer_reviews.author: willow

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea, poorly written directions
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great nightlight when you have to take care of business in the middle of the night. It also makes for some interesting conversation when guests come over. I tried to follow the instructions that came with the light, but I gave up. Here is an example of the broken English. "Select from 16 colors with lust the press of a button (Continuously Press the button until it blinks BLUE color into Selecting mode press and release once will change a color, and Continuously Press again until it blinks GREEN to return to Carousel mode)" Huh?
customer_reviews.author: Butrovich

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain and works as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother who gets up every night to use the bathroom. The fact that you have so many color choices is a plus. She adjusted hers to cycle through all the choices. Light comes on before she even gets close to the bathroom door and remains on for a bit when she is finished. The brightness can also be chosen. I liked this one because it hangs over the side of the bowl. Well made product with many features.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Haha! No need to shock my eyes at night anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product tremendously. It's motion activated. Light can change colours automatically or stay on your choice ( just press and hold on colours choice). It's nice and bright or dim if you wish. No need to put on bathroom light at night. When spouse leaves seat up I don't go sleepily sitting into the septic bowl (smh). The clip can be manipulated to get width of toilet bowl and stays tight too. Enjoying my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gag gift stocking stuffer, but it's actually very useful to have. No need to throw on the overhead light in the middle of the night anymore! The motion detector works great. The color changing aspect needs a little work though. It's a bit of a shock to see bright red down in the bowl in the middle of the night. It was easy to install - just bend a wire and hang it on the bowl, and it seems to be pretty well made too. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, perfect for night
customer_reviews.text: If your thinking of a toilet light.. buy this one! I purchased this because I got tired of having to turn on the lights in the middle of the night, blinding me and annoying the wife. The light has multiple brightness settings, allowing me to see the toilet/ whole bathroom without running into things like I used to when I wandered through darkness. This light gives just the right amount of illumination. Also, this unit lasts twice as long with one set of batteries than a similar style unit my brother-in-law bought me. Selecting the color on the vintar is also much easier than the other model and the motion activation is much better with the vintar.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martin

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Night Light Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised (things that work like they are supposed to makes me very happy). The motion detector is very sensitive, which is fine with me although I do need to close one bathroom door to keep it from turning on every time someone walks by. I cannot stand having to turn on a light in the middle of the night in order to use the bathroom because it makes it much harder to get back to sleep (getting older means I am up more than I would like to admit ;-) At any rate this light works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: The company stood by their product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this light, but it only worked for a few days. Since then, when it comes on, it immediately starts to flash then shuts off. I have put in new batteries and changed the settings, to no avail. I would return it, but I have already discarded the packaging. Instructions are written in very poor English and are difficult to understand. UPDATE - After my initial review, I was contacted by the company. They immediately sent me a replacement which worked and continues to perform as advertised. I am updating the products rating fro 1* to 4*.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Cool!
customer_reviews.text: After having 2 similar Glow Bowl lights die, I decided to try a different brand. This is almost identical to the Glow Bowl except that the sensor part is actually a little thinner, which I like. It comes on from quite a distance and only stays on a minute or so, then shuts itself off. The motion sensor works extremely well. I've had it several months and am still using the original batteries. I loved my Glow Bowls, especially their newer design with the longer battery life, and was especially pleased with their customer service. But, after repeated product failures I had to go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: wow this is weird I like this and I think it could be used in ...
customer_reviews.text: wow this is weird I like this and I think it could be used in so many other ways than portrayed, motion sensor and dark light sensor, could be a night light just about anywhere, maybe even put a clip on the main device so you could clip it wherever you wanted
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh I. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pleased at First now disappointed in Battery killer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on March 15th. It is now August 14th. Last night, I noticed after replacing the Amazon Double AA batteries, the unit now just stays on. Great product, if only the motion detector was more reliable. At first, I thought it was the Amazon Batteries, they lasted two weeks. Probably not bad for staying on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Norman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous positive feedback. I have purchased three toilet lights, two from Vintar, one from a competitor. As much as I love the concept of these, none have survived more than six months. I returned the previous purchase of this and have decided not the bother with the second. Tired of wasting my time and money. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: pjs00

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE loves it from 7-78!
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gag for my mom who is the queen of the nightlight it's the talk of the town - everyone wants to know where she got it - how to get one etc. - now my mom is 78, and the fact that everyone is this excited about her toilet has me in giggle all the way home - but hey - it's a hit got it for my nephews too - hit there as well - they're 7 and 10 so I guess you could say it's a great gift for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Van Dyne

customer_reviews.title: Never EVER buy this product. The ratings are for a prior build quality
customer_reviews.text: Worst company ever. Do not buy this. Died after three months. There is another one star review saying the same thing. I have a prior unit of their that works but it's clear the new units don't. Wrote them and zero feedback. Plan to contact Amazon directly as I have been a customer pretty much since their first day and had maybe two returns. So will get the refund from them. DON'T BUY THIS DEVICE.
customer_reviews.author: Tempusfugitve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but not for a toilet!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't interested in this product until I read a review that said that it was a great motion activated light for a room (any room). Had this been called "Motion Activated Night Light", I would have purchased it in a minute and given it five stars. It is perfect for our bathroom. When anyone walks into the bathroom, it lights up so we can see where we are going. And it turns off promptly. While I would not use this in a toilet in a million years, I love it as a motion activated night light (to use it as a nightlight, simply adjust the motion sensor so that it will "see" when someone enters the room.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! My husband doesn't like any lights on at night, not even a nightlight. As soon as you get near the bathroom doorway, it lights up and stays on long enough until I am back in bed. Amazing. I have been using it for about 3 weeks now and no issues or problems. I purchased another one for my son for his NYC apartment because his bathroom is far from his bed, and he loves gadgets. Just add batteries and bend the bar to hang over the toilet, like the old fashion scented deodorizers. Make sure you hang it on the side facing the entrance to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: rubyrose

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought a competitors version first but it was cheaply made & motion sensor didnt work,battery door didn't fit right,kinda useless. This item you can tell when you pick it up it is solid & well made. Uses AA batteries instead of AAA making it heavier when installed and stays in place. 5 step dimmer is great cause it is very bright on high when totally dark,had to lower it 2 clicks which will probably make batteries last even longer. Motion sensor works even before you get in bathroom,works as advertised,even exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for going to the bathroom at night!  Really quite life-changing.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items that make me think, "should have bought this a long time ago!" I'm a night owl and the light in my bathroom is extremely bright and a little difficult to reach, so sometimes I end up stumbling around the bathroom. This little thing is GREAT! It truly does detect motion and it's very simple to figure out how to use, with all of the different colors and brightness. Hold down to switch colors, and then hold down only once to change the brightness. Extremely simple to attach to the toilet. It's also a GREAT product for such a low price. The creator of this is a genius!
customer_reviews.author: D. Aks

customer_reviews.title: Party in the Potty!
customer_reviews.text: OK, not quite that much fun, but these motion-detecting lights are nice in the middle of the night. The intensity goes low enough that you get non-blinding illumination when and where you need it. The lights stay well above the splash zone and haven't needed any special cleaning attention yet. Now if I could just get the kid to quit setting all of them on bright red and claiming that the toilets are haaaaaaaaaaaaunted....
customer_reviews.author: Amelia E.

customer_reviews.title: Nightlight improves Aim.
customer_reviews.text: My husband's aim was significantly worse at night, so I got this on a whim and it's been AWESOME! The nightlight has a motion sensor, so it kicks on when he comes into the bathroom like a light house beacon directing him where to pee. There used to be splashes everywhere, but now he hits the toilet every time AND I'm not totally grossed out all the time. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone sharing a bathroom with a man. The product functions exactly as all other reviewers have mentioned. We've had it a few months, and the original battery is going strong.
customer_reviews.author: C. May

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY! Lasted about 2 months. Replaced batteries with new batteries and it still would not work. Several other reviews have shared similar experiences. I gave it 5 stars initially and hoped it would continue to work as advertised--also noted that time would tell. Time revealed the truth. Threw it in the trash rather than return it.
customer_reviews.author: pharper

customer_reviews.title: A Lighthouse for your Toilet Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Think Lighthouse for your Toilet Bowl. Go figure - something that sounds as goofy as a toilet bowl light really is very useful for those late night visits to your bowl. The VINTAR Motion Activated Toilet Night light gives you your choice of colors and brightness levels. Batteries last about 6 months. The Dimmest brightness and Red color work best for keeping you night vision for returning to bed in the dark. Sees you coming from about 8 feet away and lights the way.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Bulb burnt after 9 months but replacement working great
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, works well at night without turning the lights on, after 9 months the blue bulb burnt out, so I can't get any form of blue or purple colors, only green, red, yellows, which is a bummer as I prefer the calming blue! Works well but doesn't last as long as I would expect it to. Update. The company sent me a replacement and works great so far, has been about 8 months on the new one. Great customer service New update 2018. Has been a year and a half with the replacement sent to me and still working great, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: vinoisthebest

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It's strange as an adult I get so much joy out of this little light! Haha. I have an older house that's been partially gutted and updated. The bathrooms however are the last things that have been updated and so I have to deal with switches being in abnormal places and a half bath that did get added and the electricians put the switch on the left instead of the right side of the wall.. needless to say you can easily stumble around at night searching for some light to go to the restroom. Saw these and had to try them out. Motion detector works really well! Very bright but not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with many features
customer_reviews.text: We're loving this light! There are no windows in my bathroom, so I love that this device has a motion sensor as well as a light sensor to conserve the batteries. The arm that rests on the toilet rim is flexible, so this will fit any toilet perfectly. The color options are nice, and I like that I can adjust the brightness. The brightest setting gives plenty of light. This product lights the entire inside of the toilet evenly with no dim spots. It's nice not to have to turn the overhead lights on in the middle of the night when the eyes are sensitive to light. This light is definitely a conversation starter, too.
customer_reviews.author: Staci S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nightlight for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I thought about buying this for a long time before I pulled the trigger with a discount on Amazon Prime Day. I always hate blinding myself with the bathroom light at 2am. The only thing is I'd rather have one with just a dim white light. Sometimes this is a little too bright for my eyes when I'm half asleep (still way better than overhead light). Instead, it rotates through a bunch of bright colors like a party mode. Would I buy this again regardless of the party mode? Yeah lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: We have two now!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit to laughing at a previous review from someone saying they bought a bunch for family for Christmas, but after my husband has dragged three separate people into our bathroom to show them, I relent. We originally bought one to entice our child to go to the bathroom at night for potty training. After using it twice, my husband demanded one of his own. He loves that he doesn't have to turn on the bathroom light at night. And it is motion and light activated, so if you do turn on the overhead light the night light turns off. It's fantastic, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Original review updated
customer_reviews.text: Update from original review: After reading my complaint they sent me a new one free of charge. Since I was in the middle of a cross country move I did not have time to set it up until now. Great gadget and great customer service. Thai you, Vintar. Original review:Although it is supposed to be motion activated, sometimes the light stays on all night, regardless of motion detection. I've had it in use every day for a little over a week now and the batteries are still holding up so that's a positive. Otherwise I like it very much. 3 stars would be 5 if not for the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Azcusty123

customer_reviews.title: These are really helpful!
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for my wife to stop laughing.... we both found these to be really helpful. Yea, the idea might seem a bit silly to some at first, but its so nice not to have to turn the bright lights on at night just to take care of business. They are certainly bright enough to help prevent hitting your toe on something, but subdued enough that they don't hurt your eyes. I started with two of them, then went back for two more so all of our bathrooms would have one. I highly recommend them. The packaging was good, fast shipping, and really inexpensive. 5-stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like having this. It saves my eyes at night in the event that I have to get up. Its bright, but not too bright, and the colors make it entertaining. Battery life is decent though I haven't had this one long enough to really make a suggestion on how long it lasts. It is worth mentioning that this is the second time I've bought this because the first one didn't even make a year. Even after new batteries the light was barely dim and it was stuck on red.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Law

customer_reviews.title: Never turned on (I did not try it for 2 months), updated review
customer_reviews.text: I have updated this review. The unit never did go on but I have been in communication with the company and the issue has been resolved. Thank you Vintar. I ran out of the return window and not thinking it would not work did not think it would matter. It mattered. When I tried to use it, changed batteries 3 times, it still never went on. Liked the thought and the pictures. Learned a lesson about trying things out sooner when I make a purchase. Oh well. it never went on !
customer_reviews.author: Rugmuffin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!!! I got it for my 3 year old son so he could use the bathroom at night and not have to turn on the overhead bathroom light. He now would rather use the bathroom in the dark ALL the time so he can see the light :). It changes color if you want, has three brightness settings and has a motion detector so will turn off if no one is around, turns on when you walk in the bathroom and on when the light is off
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in December 2019. Installation was quite straightforward and it initially worked quite well. However, after 2 months it started behaving erratically such that I never knew which color light would be displayed. After two more weeks it refused to shut off when it was dark and there was no movement. Finally in mid-March 2020, it quit working at all. New batteries were unsuccessful and I have to discard the unit. It should not have failed so quickly. A previous unit lasted more than 2 years. Therefore I give it a 2-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: flyfish

customer_reviews.title: These are the coolest!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these because of the concept and the reasonable price. When I wake up in the middle of the night, the LAST thing I want is to have bright lights shine in my face. These cool little lights provide and automatic on/off gentle light that is adjustable in both colors and intensity. I personally like the BLUE color the best but I guess some could change colors for various holidays, etc. I have had mine for about a year and so far only one set of batteries were needed. I think that men would appreciate this type of gadget the most but it also helps keep the bathroom clean!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Palya Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: When my choices were to turn on a light which would affect my ability to go back to sleep or potentially to pee all over the floor, that leaves me between the proverbial rock and a hard place. This product comes to the rescue. One thing that I would change is to thoroughly explain how to change the colors AND how to keep the colors from scrolling. I had to inquire online both here and another forum in order to make that happen. Is it that hard to have a power button and a hold button?
customer_reviews.author: Social_CB

customer_reviews.title: Lights the way but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works but you need to leave the lid open all the time or the light will stay on constantly. There are very few directions and we couldn't figure out a way to make it turn off if the lid is closed so now we just leave it open. Even though this product is very inexpensive, it would be great if the packaging offered a little more in the form of directions. It isn't complicated, you put in batteries, hang it on the toilet and press the button to select your desired color and dim the light.
customer_reviews.author: MzH2Os

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but, but poor lifespan
customer_reviews.text: We only really got about a year and a half out of these. It works as advertised, however, on the three different toilets we had them on all three of them don't seem to be designed to be sealed properly from moisture getting in. They all stopped working at about the same time as battery coils inside seemed to corrode completely. Attempting to clean them off took a lot of the metal off and they still don't work. I will probably buy more but important to keep in mind the limitations that they have.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Vail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nightlight and bowl illuminator.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought two for each bathroom. One functioned perfectly and I set it to solid blue light. The other kept rotating colors and could not be stabilized on one. One of our guests said it was disorienting. I notified the company and they immediately sent a replacement. GreT customer service. The new unit worked just fine. I take one when we travel. My husband has Alzheimer's and it helps him see the Noel. I love it because motion sets it off and makes it a good guide in the darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate and great product when they work...?
customer_reviews.text: So I had one for three years before it stopped working properlyso hey I ordered another but unfortunately it didn't work so I returned it and received another and unfortunately that didnt work ....so being Amazon hasdifferent brands of simular products I was felt I had to try another brand so I did and it arrived and worked perfectly so great. I had thisbrand for three years so great and I love the product but I just had a run of bad luck...yes would buyfrom them again but after second time not this time....anyway thats what happened to me!
customer_reviews.author: David Messenger

customer_reviews.title: This light will enhance your life
customer_reviews.text: Going to the bathroom at night usually sucks because turning on a bright light makes you feel like a vampire hiding from the sun. Unless you have one of these. It's a peaceful way to transition back to bed, and the motion-sensored lights emanating from the toilet always makes you, and other people smile. My husband loves it because it adds an ability to aim with precision. That makes me love it too. We buy this for everyone now as a housewarming gift, or just a gift. It's fun for anyone from age 2 to 89. Just get it. We replaced batteries in six months. It's just a great, great light. GET IT.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this!
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much bought this thinking it would be a silly addition to my bathroom...but it has really helped me in my nocturnal trips to the toilet. I have to get up multiple times in the night to use the restroom and this has kept me from having to turn on bigger lights that might wake my husband or stimulate my eyes too much and make it impossible to get back to sleep. This puts out just enough light that you can see what you are doing. This "silly" purchase has become a needed item that has a permanent place on my toilet.
customer_reviews.author: vermillionprose

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but....
customer_reviews.text: We loved this light when we got it. No window in bath so very dark at night and worked just like we wanted! That being said, the batteries don’t last long but we were willing to deal with that! Now here we are two months after purchase and totally quit working .... probably shouldn’t have given two stars because certainly would have expected it to work longer but as I said really liked it while it worked... waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fun product for children and adults
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun product for children and adults. I like it because I don't have to turn on the light when I go to the bathroom in the middle of the night. It changes colors which is a little weird a first, but definitely fun. The sensor works well, but make sure there is nothing blocking the view from your door to the toilet. I had to adjust mine a few times to get it to turn on as soon as I opened the bathroom door. Overall, great product to be able to see the toilet and not fall over something without having to turn on the light and wake yourself up.
customer_reviews.author: Jo R.

customer_reviews.title: Think outside the box...uh, bowl!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little toy. I had it placed on the toilet as designed, but until I lifted the seat, there wasn’t much light, though the thin sliver was enough to guide me to the target, but when I sat down, I blocked most of the light since it’s directed into the bowl. So I hung it on the storage rack above the toilet, and voila...perfect. I did switch it to one steady color. The changing colors are pretty, but not so much when the blood red color took its turn. I’m thinking I could use one of these in other places around the house, too.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a joke, but it is a GREAT night light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a joke for my daughter, but the whole family likes it so much as a nightlight in the bathroom, that I'm back to get one for a second bathroom. I've tried multiple night lights the last few weeks and they are all terrible -- too bright, too unreliable, and/or take up the entire electrical outlet plate. This one has been going along fine for 8 months now, with no battery change. It easily removes when we clean the toilet, and is itself easy to keep clean. No one is more surprised than I am -- I really thought we'd be tossing this out after we laughed about it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Functions Quite Well
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised that this gadget actually works as described. My bathroom vent goes on with the light and I don't like all that noise late at night. When I approach the bathroom it begins to flash on in multi colors until I sit. Then it stays lit for the short time needed to wash hands and exit. Just enough light. Not obtrusive. Using the positioning recommended in the instructions, it seems out of the way. After 7 days there was no residual odor, so I assume it will not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: PresPetunia

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for six months
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Keeps me from peeing all over the place at night! Unfortunately my aim must be really bad, because some "moisture" had gotten inside and shorted out one of the lights, so my blue no longer works. Also the motion sensor is broken now. SInce it's within the warranty period I'll see if I can get a replacement... EDIT: Customer service sent a replacement free of charge. Thank you! I still think your product needs a design update to prevent this... I'd happily pay more for a more reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Astrodonkey

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. The wife made jokes about it at first, but has come to love it too. It stays out of the way and comes on when you approach the toilet in the dark, providing multiple soft LED light colors. For me it makes it easier to get back to sleep after visiting the bathroom in the middle of the night, vs cutting on the overheads. I will be buying more of these as Christmas gifts this year!
customer_reviews.author: Silverback

customer_reviews.title: This is a product you will be telling all your friends and neighbors to buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! I did a lot of research before I bought this particular one since there were several different manufacturers to choose from. I initially was going to buy the one from Shark Tank, but it had too many bad reviews. This one is easy to use, easy to install, and has 16 colors to choose from. You can choose any one of the 16 colors or you can choose to have a continuous changing of all16 colors. This is a product that most people would never think of using, but once you install it, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: bdb

customer_reviews.title: Neat...for a while
customer_reviews.text: Product was great while it worked. I got about six months out of it before it just stopped working. That was two battery changes by the way. My dog triggered it more than i imagine most households would. I am torn on ordering another, really enjoyed the light - it made getting up during the night much easier...but based on a number of other reviews on Amazon it appears that you need to buy the three pack and just plan on switching it out every six months when it dies.
customer_reviews.author: kingspoint93

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I got bright LED lights in my bathroom, so when its late at night or early morning, I hate turning my bathroom lights on. That's where this thing comes in! Motion sensor senses I'm there and just lights up the target for me! Really nice for my eyes! It also makes a great talking piece for when anyone new comes over! Motion sense can be a little finicky at times where it doesn't want to turn on. I just swipe my foot in front of it once and it fixes it.
customer_reviews.author: Immortalkrogan

customer_reviews.title: If youre needing a night light for the bathroom. You need to purchase this one NOW!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this light for our daughter, as she would wake in the middle of the night to use the restroom and leave every light on!! Well, let me just say, best purchase EVER!! The motion sensor detects her before she even gets into the bathroom which provides her with enough light to make it from her room to the bathroom and also will stay on long enough for her to get back to bed. It automatically turns off when a bright light is present, i.e. sunlight or main bathroom light. I am beyond pleased with this product. If you're needing a night light for the bathroom, get one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a month and a half boo
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after a month and a half. It's real cool but it says I can't return or replace after a month and it's been a month and a half. So if they don't stand by their product you have to let people know. not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I bought 4 and will keep 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought 4 and will keep 2 and use the other 2 as stocking stuffers for extended family. These lights work really well and I love not having to turn on the bathroom light in the middle of the night. You can choose the color of light you want and change it any time. The motion sensor works right away with no delay. Position it correctly on the toilet so it can sense the first bit of movement. It shuts off quickly after being activated and only works in the dark. It's a great gift to give and also great to have in your own home.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Great color choices, adjustable settings and, most importantly, long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased several copies of a similar product from Glow Bowl; unfortunately, they all quit working within about 2 months (battery replacement only revived them for a few days). Thus far, the Vintar light is going strong. The colors are nice, and once it's set it's hassle-free. If I have any complaint, it's that in middle-of-the-night darkness, even the lowest setting is a little bright. Still, overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GS_Jennsen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this light. As someone who wears glasses I find that late night lights really mess up my sleep cycle. This light was a wonderful way to tinkle in the middle of the night without having to be wide awake for the rest of the night. The light was bright but not blinding and turned on immediately after opening the door or walking into the bathroom. Unfortunately, the light died after 7 months even after replacing the batteries. Very sad it's no longer working but still a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Centeno

customer_reviews.title: a couple problems with mine
customer_reviews.text: The toilet light works okay, but a couple problems have popped up. First, the motion sensor is too sensitive. I had to position mine so it wouldn't turn on every time I walked by the bathroom door. Second, the blue LED stopped working after a month. To avoid the light going completely dark in its cycle of colors, I had to manually set it to one color only. Even so, I recommend this light since the alternatives sound even worse from their reviews. I bought a couple more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it, You know you want it!!
customer_reviews.text: If you or someone you love gets up in the middle of the night, this product is absolutely worth the money spent. So far all positive and nothing bad to say about it. If I were asked about how to improve the product, I would suggest that there be a different style attachment to the toilet rather than just dangling over. Very easy to use and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: chuck crabbe

customer_reviews.title: Works great/ still great but lasted 1 yr.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I set on violet to prevent blue light. Red is terrible for bathroom, just saying. Update, well it lasted almost a year. Guess not bad. Thought batteries dead but found had corroded at one of the battery connections. Remember this is close to water and splashes. Going to order new one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Must have for pregnant women!!
customer_reviews.text: This is something I didn’t even knew existed BUT when I became pregnant, I started waking up 30 times a night to go pee and hated turning all the lights on. My husband found this so we decided to try it. As soon as I walked in the bathroom the light to the vintar would come on and wouldn’t startle me like the bathroom light. Been easily able to go right back to sleep. Lights up the bathroom but not too bright. Also, the light is changeable but it’s very confusing on how to do it so I just keep it on the light blue color.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Husband doesn't wake us up to pee anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that when my husband goes to the restroom he wouldn't wake us all up with turning on the light. It works great. He wasn't too pleased about it when I bought it but when I actually installed it (which was a no brainer) he loved it. The different light options were a cool feature. Now we can't imagine going to the restroom without it. Totally would recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw this at a friend’s house who also has a commode area that has no electrical outlets for a nigh light and cannot be lit without turning on the bright overhead light. I almost died laughing when she showed this to me and I thought how ridiculous. But remember guys, happy wife, and happy life. I made the purchase, installed it in seconds and I must admit, it works like a charm. Very nice for middle of the night ventures to the commode and you don’t won’t to turn on a bright overhead light. My wife loves it so I am a happy man!
customer_reviews.author: mkpi

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought five more as gifts ...
customer_reviews.text: Item of the century! Loved it so much I bought five more as gifts and everyone who saw its functionality wanted one! It’s motion sensor on 3 AA batteries so place it where motion will activate it in the front right side. You have to keep the lid up to get the unexpected rainbow color expressions from your guests but my toilets are clean! Great gift and my 70 year old in laws love it because they don’t have to put the bathrooms lights on in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: This company really stands behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised & impressed when they sent me a replacement after eleven months! It just stopped working & I contacted them. This is an extra safety measure for evening bathroom trips, especially if there’s an older, impaired family member. Even if they may forget to turn the light on, this light guides them to the toilet. It goes on when the room darkens & the light is adjustsble. It’s not too bright so it does not bother people that like it dark when they sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A

customer_reviews.title: Good motion sensor light
customer_reviews.text: It does what they say it does. The light's neck is flexible but will hold shape. It has 5 different light levels and a bunch of different colors (16 I think) to choose from. I was pleasantly surprised on the range of motion detection. It picks up motion as soon as I turn the corner approx 8-10ft from my toilet. Easy to clean too. Prefer this over a traditional "night light" any day especially cause it turns off after you leave as I am able to see the light when in my bed when the lights are off
customer_reviews.author: Mike Warthan

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Really works. I have mine in the private area where the toilet is. During the day there is enough light that it does not keep turning on. The motion sensor reaches very far. The minute I get out of bed about 12 feet away, it turns on. I have mine on the color changing cycle but you can put it any color you like and there are two settings for how bright you want it. The low one is plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: ms. thang

customer_reviews.title: Weeeeeee !
customer_reviews.text: Disco lights in the loo ! Great to stop the blokes weeing all over the bathroom floor at night. I have it set to disco mode where it rotates through all the colors. Add some banging techno on the shower radio, were some white gloves and a whistle and you got yourself and rave in the WC. UPDATE : after more than a year of constant use it is STILL working with the original batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Optophobia

customer_reviews.title: Most Innovative Product Out There
customer_reviews.text: At first I bought with the intention of minimizing my partner's messy aim at night. To be honest, he was getting worse because he was distracted by the light (working hypothesis), which was directly observed in morning cleaning. BUT I live by myself now and the only outlet in the bathroom is connected to the switch. I didn't realize that until I bought a great non-blinding night light to find it was only on when the lights were on. (Sad trumpets) Anyway, I will be purchasing my second Vintar "Cool Gadget" as the first was valiantly sacrificed to the God of Exes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Slowly but surely it stops working and the light goes out
customer_reviews.text: First the multicolored lights failed after 3 months and then only the red or blue light would come one. Then only the blue light, and then it stopped working completely. Changed the batteries, wiped off the unit but it quit working after about 6 months. I'd rather a dependable simple night light in the bathroom instead of purchasing another of these novelty items.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: T WORKED! The information I submitted below was resolved with a simple fix to a spring.
customer_reviews.text: Received light promptly. Placed the batteries in the unit slim, attractive case. Took it to the bathroom. Placed the item on the bowl. Turned off all the lights and... nothing. Nada. No light. Starting processing return. "Item ineleigble for Return". Went to seller sight. Referred to Amazon general return policy. Reviewed order. Couldn't find anything about return. Amazon agent generated refund. Now I have a small piece of plastic I can pretend is a medical device of vague purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Spider Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Love it more than I thought...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nightlight for my 5 y.o. grandson when he gets up in the middle of the night, but hubby was envious so I had to buy him one too! I’ve had my first one for four months and the original batteries are still going strong. I was concerned that it was going to eat through batteries quickly (per other reviews), but have not found this to be the case. Hubby gets his for Christmas, so will update this review if the second one proves to be different.
customer_reviews.author: MDexter

customer_reviews.title: These are Not Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. The first just stopped working for an unknown reason and I threw it out. This one has been working up until last Monday and just stopped. Of course, I replaced the 3 batteries in both units, with fresh ones just bought in Costco. NO light at all on either one. ??? They are such a simple, easy to use item and work great for a few weeks. I can not recommend this product by any means. It will not last, certainly, more than a few months at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as kind of a funny Christmas gift, even though it's kind of a necessity now. I wasn't sure how he would react. He opened the present in front of our two young adult sons and they all LOVED it. The boys, who live on their own in the same house want one of their own! The really cool points of this gadget are that the color of the light can rotate, and if a light in the bathroom is turned on, it turns off. So it's not only motion activated, but also light activated. This was a huge hit as a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Amostee

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet light, made my wife a believer!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was skeptical about whether we really needed this toilet night light. After a few weeks of using it, she agrees it's great! Like many men, I decided to throw out the utterly useless instruction booklet immediately; for the more favorable method of monkeying around for some time trying to figure out how to change the color of the light. Eventually I was able to get it to do what I wanted, but I would suggest checking out the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Woff Den

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and Soft Light to See Your Way At Night.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a small bathroom,and it is very helpful at night. I like the various colors of light to choose from, and that you can set it on one particular color of choice.Tip,save the light directions,the directions tell how to set one color. Don’t know how I got along without it before. Light goes on when I go into bathroom. I have it set on blue now,but may change the color setting. There are directions that come with the nightlight. Easy to use and stays put under the toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jmcm

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a built in light light with this
customer_reviews.text: I already a seat light that was built in to the seat. However, we bought one of these for the kid's bathroom and liked how it worked. So, we got one for the master bath. The motion detection works great. It's not blindingly bright; it's just right for doing night time business without missing or breaking something on the way there. Also, it can be changed to several colors. We like just letting play through all the cool colors it automatically supports.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We all LOVE this product! Family members asked for this after seeing mine. My daughter said it was so helpful for her boyfriend at night to be able to see in the darkness, if you get my aim?! LOL We all like the blue or green steady light on the dimmest light setting. It's more comfortable for darkness on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one.  This on is good, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: All toilets that might be used by men at night should be required to have one of these. :-) BUT this one's field of view for motion detection is a little too tight. It lights up as you approach it, but doesn't see you when you are standing in front of it so the light goes out when you need it the most. Then when you leave, it sees you again and lights up when you don't really need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and 2 seem to work but 1 does not. It stays on all the time and won’t turn off. Unfortunately I bought it as a Christmas gift and by the time I knew it didn’t work, I could no longer return it. Even though 2 work, I would NOT recommend this product as that’s only a 66% success rate. I love the idea so will try to find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Well, at first this item was great, but its been a little over a year (its been broken about 6-8 months) at first it had both modes and 16 colors. A year later the led seems to be dying before the batteries ran out. Only one color now (green) and there is no carousel mode either. The only color green barely lights up at all so it basically doesnt do much. I might try another one but it would certainly be a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: HR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It’s the second one I’ve ordered. Works great last long on batteries and services a great purpose. It’s also a crowd pleaser, lol. Many compliments from my company. I have one on my powder room and one in my master bath. Great for the price. Seller is awesome. I would recommend this to anyone. Oh and my grandson loves going with the lights out 😉
customer_reviews.author: Mimi1320

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea !!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Vintar 16-color Motion Sensor. The motion detector comes on as I'm approaching the room. No more turning on the light in the middle of the night. Right now, I have it set for blue, lowest brightness. For the holidays, I'll change colors. Red or green for Christmas, St. Patrick's Day, etc. When I first bought 4 of them, I thought they would be a good gag gift for Christmas, but as it turns out, these are very fun and useful. I think everyone will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Lasted six months but prompt refund
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but this is a functional night light for the bathroom. I don't need the multi-color light show in my toilet so I set it for steady blue. The brightness can be adjusted too. The motion detector and photo detector work together so it goes on when you approach in the dark. UPDATE - worked fine for six months then started to malfunction. Choice of colors is one - pale pink. Doesn't switch on and off properly. I contacted the seller and got a prompt refund.
customer_reviews.author: Walyo

customer_reviews.title: No more turning on the lights to go to the bathroom at night!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gag gift. But, ended up loving it and buying it for ourselves! It hooks easily to the toilet and lights the bowl as soon as you walk near the toilet. There are color settings and brightness settings so that it can be customized to your needs. My only complaint is that it seems cheaply made and probably won't last very long. We ordered our first and it broke within 5 minutes of opening the package. But, we were able to get a refund and have replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Elenore

customer_reviews.title: outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! no more turning on a bright light when going to the bathroom at night,no feeling around to find the comode seat.as soon as the sensor feels you the colored light comes on in the bowl and there you are.it gives off just the right amount of light where you can see where you are going.great purchase as far as i'm concerned.i bought the Vintar brand because of the recomendations from people who had bought other brands and said this one was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOW FUN
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for xmas and my little grandson loved it so much i bought this one for him. He has it in his bathroom at home and loves it. It is a lot of fun but i love that i don't have to turn on the light when going to the bathroom at night. It turns on by itself when you walk in the bathroom at night and gives off plenty of light and turns off when you walk out. It starts off red and cycles thru several colors. Had it a month and the batteries are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: deb richardson

customer_reviews.title: This S#!+ is lit yo!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a joke at first. After putting batteries in and installing it, its really cool! I can get up in the middle of the night and my porcelain throne lights up like the portal to Hades awaiting my delivery of yesterday's meal. With 16 different colors, I can customize my stay. I can change colors every day of the week! (Red works best on Wednesday since Taco Tuesday is the day before) Turn it on the carousel mode first thing in the morning, crank up some classical on Pandora and you will have your own Bellagio water fountain show!
customer_reviews.author: John Brady

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very sensitive to motion when a light/sunlight is not present. I haven't done anything to 'program' the unit so mine cycles through the various colors. Some colors (reds) are just not as bright as the others. But the unit has held up well, seems very reliable, and only required battery replacement once in about a year. I'm definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Worked while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It worked as described for the first couple months. Recently it ran out of battery, so had to change it with same kind of batteries as before. While it still lights up, its stuck at the color red. It no longer generates any other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed 'Nefarius' Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about 4 months. Easy to adjust the brightness, rotate through colors, or set it to be on one. Best investment for a child's bathroom. However, after changing out the batteries, the only color that now works is green so if I set it to rotate, it's black until it goes back around to green. It's never been wet and when I hold down the button to program a solid color it still blinks red or green....so the bulb isn't dead.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Works so far, and you can adjust brightnesd
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. Someone brought 1 for me as a gag gift and it was one of the coolest things I brought another they both were crappy and didn't last 3 months. But the cool factor and the fact that I hate turning on lights to pee at night made me try this one out. I'm going to update this review if it continues to last. I do like the fact you can adjust the brightness levels and that it is very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Pero

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this thing for a couple of weeks but so far I am super happy with it. The motion detector is very sensitive so when the room is dark, I only have to get close to the toilet and it comes on. When it is light, the light doesn't come on. It has lots of different colors and you just cycle through them by pressing one button. It also has a random light choice if you are feeling adventurous. I bought ten more of these little gems for stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Thorstein Veblen

customer_reviews.title: Worked until the batteries died.
customer_reviews.text: When I replaced the batteries which did last a long time mind you.. it just stopped working. It would only go to red light then after a few more button presses stopped working all together. I think moisture (probably piss) got into the unit and brokededed it.
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt503

customer_reviews.title: Good night light
customer_reviews.text: So I got this mainly for a motion light when I get up to use the bathroom at night. I haven't tried it as an actual toilet light where you hook it on the seat or bowl. Anyway this has great motion sensor and battery life. The color selection is pretty good and has a few brightness setting to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: Soup

customer_reviews.title: Received old dirty, used and defective unit by different manufacturer..
customer_reviews.text: I baiught the Vintar but received a dirty, stinky, used and defective illumibowl instead... It has brown crusty crap all around the light which is disgusting since these are used in toilets... Unbelievable that something like this could happen.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy T Colbern

customer_reviews.title: A must have for those older folks who need better aim and for those who trip in dark bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: How can a person take such pleasure in have a glowing toilet in the middle of the night. This gal, that's who. After I took a header into the tub (I don't turn the overhead bath light on at night) my generous husband was compelled to rescue me from any future mishaps if not broken legs. This thing is great, I am sure it will be the talk of the town in my family for generations to come.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I hate turning the light on in the middle of the night to use the bathroom and this product saves me from that. What is great about it is that the sensor only activates when the sun goes down so you aren't wasting battery power during the day. The brightness is perfect and I just overall it is such a cool product. I don't currently have children, but I think it would be a for someone who has kids because it can be used as a nightlight in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Illumibowl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the Illumibowl, which crapped out after less than a year. Waited a few months to review to see how well it works, and I am not disappointed thus far. Lots of colors to choose from, and I haven’t had to change the batteries out a million times like I did with the Illumibowl. Love being able to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night without turning on a single light. And so many colors to choose from, couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I felt guilty when I bought this. It seemed silly and I expected a really, really cheap product. NOT SO! It delivered on every promise made. Easy to install. Easy to customize. It is very practical versus silly. It promotes hygiene and safety - you can navigate to and see the toilet in the dark. It is economical - you do not need to turn in the lights. Visitors love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love the color choices
customer_reviews.text: Because my commode sits between the shower and the vanity, the sensor doesn't detect movement when I'm coming in from the direction of the shower. I suppose if you placed the sensor right it front, it would work in both directions. Love the color choices. Having some difficulty in programming the intensity of the light. It has variable dimming options and I would like it to be a bit dimmer than it's current setting. Once I figure that out, it will be fine. Appears constructed in a way that will be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
